Package com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout

Provides classes which are used to visually arrange components in a UI.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LayoutManager
    The LayoutManager interfaces describes classes which can arrange components within a container.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BorderLayout
    BorderLayout is a LayoutManager that emulates BorderLayout.
    ColumnLayout
    ColumnLayout renders its items in columns.
    FlowLayout
    FlowLayout is a LayoutManager that emulates FlowLayout.
    GridLayout
    GridLayout is a LayoutManager that emulates GridLayout.
    ListLayout
    ListLayout renders out its items in a list.
    UIManager
    The UIManager provides a mechanism for client applications to use different Renderers, without having to specify a renderer on a per-component basis.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BorderLayout.BorderLayoutConstraint
    An enumeration of the possible locations for content within a border layout.
    ColumnLayout.Alignment
    An enumeration of possible values for horizontal alignment of column content.
    FlowLayout.Alignment
    This is used to control the alignment of the components.
    FlowLayout.ContentAlignment
    This is used to control the alignment of the content in each cell.
    ListLayout.Alignment
    An enumeration of possible values for horizontal alignment of column content.
    ListLayout.Separator
    An enumeration of possible values for the item separator.
    ListLayout.Type
    An enumeration of possible values for the list type.

Package com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout Description

Provides classes which are used to visually arrange components in a UI.
